article_title: Sept. 17 in Nashville: Perfect opportunity to rally against constitutional violations
article_text:
Paris, TN (38242)

Today

Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High around 85F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Partly to mostly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: On Constitution Day, Sept. 17, the Tennessee Pastors Network (tnpastors.net) is sponsoring a rally 11 a.m.-1 p.m. at the state capitol focused on religious freedom and the 10th Amendment.
